idea:
When people from diverse walks of life, get together and share common ideas and ideologies, it is destiny, this destiny; is what lead to the formation of Morya Vegetables.
Through common friends, two diverse groups - one being a collective of farmers and suppliers of agricultural produce and the other being first generation technology entrepreneurs, got together and shared the ideology that the business of agricultural produce needed transparency and optimization.
The possibilities of what could be done and how it could be done were discussed. This is when they realized that in spite of diverse backgrounds, they share a common need; which is to do right for the farmers and for the people.
They combined their skills, knowledge, experience and resources to do take the first steps to optimise a business segment which is frequented by exploitation, politics and enormous wastage.
This is how Morya Vegetables was born with a will to implement a solution, one step at a time, to help the farmers of India live a better life and to help the consumers to save on groceries and stay healthy!
name: Morya Vegetables
